pullrequest.title: Link to tool for automatic mesh geometry computation and cleanup.

content.raw:
Hi @hamzamerzic , thanks for working on this tool!

I tried out some meshes from the model database such as [this one](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/src/4b4490dc9e938b42d2e9c8c7cce1bad177ad65f5/coke_can/meshes/coke_can.dae?fileviewer=file-view-default) but I never get to see the volume, CoM and inertia as described. Am I doing something wrong? I tried both Firefox and Chrome. I also noticed that DAE meshes seem to be uploaded correctly, but OBJ meshes don't.

![meshcleaner.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RMMxjX/images/1647257437-meshcleaner.png)
content.html:

I tried out some meshes from the model database such as this one but I never get to see the volume, CoM and inertia as described. Am I doing something wrong? I tried both Firefox and Chrome. I also noticed that DAE meshes seem to be uploaded correctly, but OBJ meshes don't.
